alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 5:28AM AKST until December 14 at 11:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION HEAVY SNOW EVENT FOR THE HAINES AND KLONDIKE HIGHWAYS THROUGH THURSDAY NIGHT... .A wave of moisture moving through the northern panhandle will bring moderate to heavy snow for the Haines and Klondike Highways. A period of snow near sea level for Haines and Skagway will last through Thursday morning. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches for the towns of Haines and Skagway increasing to up to 24 inches along the Haines Highway and Klondike Highway. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines, including the Haines and Klondike Highways. * WHEN...until 11 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult and is discouraged unless it is an emergency. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of snow for the towns of Haines and Skagway before mixing with then a changeover to rain near sea level by late Thursday morning into early Thursday afternoon. Snow will continue along the Haines and Klondike Highways for the duration of the event. The greatest snow totals will be above 500 ft on the Klondike Highway and past mile point 20 on the Haines Highway. Heaviest precipitation Thursday morning into the afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
